title: Form Validation - Successful Submission
description: Verify that the form submits successfully with valid data.
preconditions: User is on the test showcase page.

steps.action: Enter a valid username in the 'Username' field
Enter a valid email in the 'Email' field
Enter a valid password in the 'Password' field
Select a country from the 'Country' dropdown
Check the 'I agree to the terms and conditions' checkbox

steps.expected_result: The message 'Form submitted successfully!' is displayed
